description: Sample user configurations for UserWalletCreation walkthrough testing

users.description: Alice is a blueprint designer who creates workflows
Bob is a developer who integrates with Sorcha APIs
Charlie is a standard user who executes workflows
Diana is an auditor with read-only access to audit logs
Eve has multiple roles and uses maximum security settings

notes: All users use the same password for testing: SecurePass123!
Users are designed for different Phase 2 scenarios:
- Alice, Bob, Charlie: Invoice approval workflow (vendor, approver, finance)
Wallet algorithms are varied to demonstrate different cryptographic options
Mnemonic word counts demonstrate both 12 and 24-word options

usage.createAllUsers: Use this file with a batch script to create all test users at once
usage.phase1: Create users one at a time with phase1-create-user-wallet.ps1
usage.phase2: Use Alice, Bob, Charlie for multi-user blueprint scenarios
